name: Knock & Run
description:
Get ready to flex those skills! Knock & Run is a fun PvP game where you gotta hit your opponents with your balls to emerge victorious.



Objective:
Be the last player remaining on the field to win the game!

Instructions:
  • Transform a white ball to your color by touching it.
  • Use the balls in your color to knock down other players.
  • Keep playing until only one player is left standing, and that player will be declared the winner!



Features
  • Unique casual game, score as much as you can. Endless fun!
  • Local multiplayer - up to 4 players
  • 5 types of maps, procedurally generated

Credits
Narrator: Trenton Castillo

We would like to extend our gratitude to Maya for her valuable support and creative ideas, and to Oded for contributing to the initial concept!
